name: Web Bookmark Manager
description: Find it difficult to read all the articles at one time? Want to watch a video at a later time? Want to save all the important information you come across the web in one place? Want to save informative tweets and threads?Well this template is all you need. It lets you save literally any thing on the web that has a link into your Notion workspace. You can read it later, overview it or just save it as a source of information.This will be your next warehouse for Internet information...Get it now for
